title: Aids to independence

description: Episode number 4 of Series "The Vintage Years". Outlines how elderly people can be assisted to live independently and the contribution of voluntary agencies in providing meeting places. Lord Morrison of Lambeth, a pioneer of municipal government discusses the role of the community and the program concludes with an extract from an interview with the famous psychoanalyst Professor Carl Jung when he was 85.
